nodes.text: The X-Wing Collector Series is a collection of revamped versions of X-Wing and TIE Fighter using the X-Wing vs TIE Fighter engine, a cut down version of STAR WARS: X-Wing vs TIE Fighter called X-Wing vs TIE Fighter: Flight School.
X-Wing vs TIE Fighter: Flight School
In X-Wing vs TIE Fighter: Flight School the player could play as either an X-Wing or a TIE Fighter and get into space battles against the other side.
